title: The Tithe of the Golden Eclipse
flavor_text: The excessive circulation of currency has caused a mystical resonance known as 'The Midas Taint,' threatening to destabilize the very foundations of the realm. The Grand Archivist decrees that the excess gold must be returned to the earth to appease the spirits of commerce and anchor the leaking Ley-lines.
objective: Donate a minimum of 500,000 Gold to the Imperial Void Vaults located in major capitals to contribute to the World-Seal Project.
reward: Exclusive 'Ascended Philanthropist' Title, the 'Aurelian Wings' non-tradable cosmetic, and a permanent 5% discount at all NPC reputation vendors.
